ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Model

Class Answer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Model.Content
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Model.Topic
        • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Model.Answer

  • public class Answer
extends Topic
    The Answer class extends the Topic class, providing no extra functionality. This class exists primarily to create a clear Object Oriented distinction between different uses of the Topic class.
    Author:
    Brett Commandeur (commande)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Answer()
      Creates an empty Answer object
      Answer(java.lang.String body, java.lang.String authorId)
      Creates an Answer containing the body text provided, and associated with the given author ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Answer

        public Answer()
        Creates an empty Answer object

      • Answer

        public Answer(java.lang.String body,
              java.lang.String authorId)
        Creates an Answer containing the body text provided, and associated with the given author ID.
        Parameters:
        body - String stored by the new instance of Answer.
        authorId - Identifier used to keep track of the unique user that provided the text of this Answer.
        See Also:
        Topic.Topic(String, String)
